data.reason: OVERBOUGHT REJECTION: RSI 87.4 exceeds safe threshold (>75 = Overbought). BTC bearish (-2.46%) without relative strength decoupling in PAXG. +1.6% gain insufficient to justify entry in overbought state. Mimicking WON strategies (AERO +6.4%, ROSE +9.1%) requires RSI 50-70 range; PAXG violates this. LOST trades (PROMPT -6.9%, -7.5%) show danger of chasing momentum in weak setups. Better to preserve capital and wait for RSI pullback to 50-70 range with sustained momentum.
